root: ^Welcome, traveler, to Frozen in Time. Time may be suspended in this realm,
^but your dash possesses the power to momentarily freeze the motion of moving and falling platforms.
^Use this ability to overcome perilous gaps and reach new heights.
^Within this realm, a memory fragment awaits, beckoning you to unlock the secrets of your forgotten past.
^Seek it out, for it holds the key to illuminate your journey and aid in your quest to remember.
^Embrace the frozen stillness, harness the fleeting moments of control, and unravel the enigma that binds this realm.
^Venture forth, brave soul, and may your dashing prowess and the echoes of your past lead you to the truth that lies ahead of you.
